plot: Faced with the daunting prospect of a family dinner, Tom pays a young woman to masquerade as his girlfriend in an attempt to both impress and intimidate his imperious father. Sadly for Tom, its a cruel world out there...
title: Hard Times for Softcore
plot_es: Faced with the daunting prospect of a family dinner, Tom pays a young woman to masquerade as his girlfriend in an attempt to both impress and intimidate his imperious father. Sadly for Tom, its a cruel world out there...
plot_en: Faced with the daunting prospect of a family dinner, Tom pays a young woman to masquerade as his girlfriend in an attempt to both impress and intimidate his imperious father. Sadly for Tom, its a cruel world out there...
